summary: Diagnosed with a terminal form of cancer, Patrick Foley has returned to his native Australia to die in the peace and quiet of the wilderness. His simple plan is complicated, however, when he meets a young boy who has just lost his parents.
cast: William Holden|Ricky Schroder|Jack Thompson|Olivia Hamnett|Alwyn Kurts|Pat Evison|Redmond Phillips|Ray Barrett|Tony Barry|Allan Penney|Willie Fennell|Walter Pym|Cul Cullen|Dawn Gregg|Maggie Blinco|Tui Bow|Danny Adcock|Jane Harders|Harry Neilson
